nodes.text: Star Wars Monthly was the fourth title of Marvel UK's Star Wars comic series. (The series' previous title was The Empire Strikes Back Monthly.) The series reprinted stories from Marvel Comics' American Star Wars series, along with several original tales. The American comic's issues were usually split into smaller segments and appeared over a number of issues.
The numbering system continued from the previous title. The series became Return of the Jedi Weekly after issue #171.
